archimate:Device.name: Horizon Terminal
archimate:Device.documentation:
Lenovo M79 Desktop PC with a Specialix RJ11/12 4 port add-in card to provide RS232 connectivity.
Spec: • AMD A8-6500B Processor (4MB Cache, up to 4.10GHz) FM2 • 4GB PC3-12800 1600MHz DDR3 UDIM (1 DIMM) • 500GB 7200RPM SATA 6GB/s 2.5mm slim • No optical drive • AMD Radeon HD Graphics, integrated in processor, uses main memory, Direct 11.1
